#  ChatGPT Clone tutorial

Need help APIs

thomasgerard1711 November 27, 2023, 7:38pm  1

Hi, I am currently following a ChatGPT clone tutorial on the internet:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WfkNKbz32XY&ab_channel=PlanetNoCode  
Everything works, however when I send the second message, in case of the
tutorial “Tell 5 place to visit there” I get an HTTP400 error:

  

I have shared all the codes here below, is there anyone who can tell me what I
did wrong? My assumption is something with the Do a search for button, however
till now I couldn’t figure it out. Code:

Schermafbeelding 2023-11-27 2020551110×668 35 KB

  

Schermafbeelding 2023-11-27 2020401164×468 26.7 KB

  

Schermafbeelding 2023-11-27 2020241200×748 31.1 KB

  

Schermafbeelding 2023-11-27 2021291152×570 32.7 KB

  

Schermafbeelding 2023-11-27 2021231140×435 23.2 KB
